item.title: Spirit Airlines furloughing 1,800 flight attendants just before Christmas travel season
item.description: Nearly 1,800 Spirit Airlines flight attendants face job losses before Christmas travel season as the budget airline continues restructuring.

item.title: Mortgage rates fall again, refinances jump to highest level since 2022
item.description: The average rate on the 30-year fixed mortgage fell this week to 6.26%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Thursday. That is down fr...

item.title: Families sue Boeing, Honeywell over deadly Air India crash that killed 260 people in June
item.description: Families of the deadly June 12 Air India crash are suing Boeing and Honeywell, allegeing that the incident was caused by faulty fuel switches.
